channel.title: Server help please!
channel.description:
Hi, im a newby at private server owning hosting and coding and i would love it if someone could PLEASE help me with a bit of trouble i've run into when compiling. [img]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww9/Sidekick4832/WTFplzhelp.jpg[/img]
If anyone could successfuly help me i will love you forever give yo co-owner on my server and anything really. Please and thank you.

item.title: Server help please!
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

to make yourself owner go to class(folder) then data(folder) then characters(folder) then mainsave(folder) then right click and move over open with then select wordpad(it will only work with wordpad not notepad)

Read full topic

item.title: Server help please!

item.description:

item.title: Server help please!
item.dc:creator: @sidekick4832 sidekick4832
item.description:
@sidekick4832 wrote:

yes it helped alot :] so now i get two windows command processors saying servers up and shit. but how do i get on? i type in the server address but it doesnt work. help?

Read full topic

item.title: Server help please!
item.dc:creator: @billyjr33 billyjr33
item.description:
@billyjr33 wrote:

watever jdk download you done that is your jdk number so anyway

open your server file to the compile then right click on the compile and edite it then something like this should pop up

@echo off
Title BoobScape Compiler
cd …
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./Bulby/./io/*.java
pause

see where it has jdk1.6.0_16

yer well all you need to do is to change the 16 number to watever your jdk number is

so i hoped it helped

Read full topic
